resources.string: Your previous orders are listed below:

A1. Silver Scoop is a one stop application to get rid of your hunger.At Silver Scoop we strive to add value to your business. We understand the challenges you face on a daily basis in sourcing the best quality food and packaging material. Silver Scoop takes care of all your packaging needs and caters you the best food.
Q2. How are you guys are different?

A2. Best service - We ensure best service is provided to users and our motto is customer satisfaction. Best Product- We only list the products which have passed our quality tests and are the best suitable for delivery.
Q3. Is the person delivering my order verified ?
A3. Our each service member is appointed after complete examinations like police verification
Q4. What is the refund policy?
A4. If you have any trouble with your orders, feel free to contact us.
Q5. Do you deliver in my area?
A5. If your location is within the parameters, We Will Reach You.
